snippet: In addition to the dead, three people, including a police officer, were injured in the attack at the Sikh Temple of Wisconsin, officials said.
abstract: Armed man fires on congregants at the Sikh Temple in Oak Creek, Wis, killing six people and wounding three others; gunman's rampage ends when one of the first police officers to arrive shoots and kills him; another police officer is ambushed by the gunman and shot multiple times, but is expected to survive; police have not released details about the gunman or a possible motive for the shooting.

byline.original: By STEVEN YACCINO, MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Steven Yaccino reported from Oak Creek, and Michael Schwirtz and Marc Santora from New York. Ray Rivera and Jack Begg contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: In addition to the dead, three people, including a police officer, were injured in the attack at the Sikh Temple of Wisconsin, officials said.

headline.seo: Gunman Kills 6 at Sikh Temple in Wisconsin
headline.main: Gunman Kills 6 at a Sikh Temple Near Milwaukee
headline.print_headline: Gunman Kills 6 at a Sikh Temple Near Milwaukee
